EmailTemplate.name: Notify Employee to Check Payslip
EmailTemplate.subject: ANNOUNCEMENT TO CHECK PAYSLIP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Payslip__c.OwnerFullName},
We write this Email to inform you that you Payslip {!Payslip__c.Name} in {!Payslip__c.Salarycycle__c} of {!Payslip__c.Year__c} is now available.
Please check and response us if there is anything to concern.
Dearest Regards, TCL HR Department
